Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim and wall of a red pottery bowl with convex sides and everted ledge-rim, the fabric is relatively coarse, the outer surface is covered with a red-slip and the exterior bears traces of one line of incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394243) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394243)
